actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to suspend until July 1, 1989, the duty on yttrium bearing ores, materials, and compounds containing by weight more than 19 percent but less than 85 percent yttrium oxide equivalent.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend until July 1, 1989, the duty on ores, materials, and compounds containing more than 19 percent but less than 85 percent of yttrium oxide equivalent.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until July 1, 1989, the duty on yttrium bearing ores, materials, and compounds containing by weight more than 19 percent but less than 85 percent yttrium oxide equivalent.
